page.title: 17BODFARI CONCRETE COMPANY
page.content: One of the few industries in the village of Bodfari is the concrete works situated near the busy A541 on the Tremeichion turn off.The raw materials of cement,sand and stone are brought in and these are mixed in a large electric mixer to make concrete. Many different concrete products are made depending on demand_ paving slabs,posts,balastrades ornamental garden pots etc.All the products are made in a metal mould with plastic spacers holding steel bars to strengthen the finished article.The mould is placed on a vibrating machine to compact the cement and to allow air bubbles to escape.The concrete is then left to harden in the mould.Sometimes a dye is added to the raw material to colour the finished article.
